articles.description: SAMSUNG looks almost certain to release its new Galaxy Watch later this month and, although it looks like a solid upgrade, fans could face a high price for owning one.

articles.author: Adam Bankhurst
articles.title: The World Ends with You: The Animation Gets Its First Teaser Trailer - IGN
articles.description: The World Ends with You: The Animation will be released in 2021 and it just received its first teaser trailer.
articles.content: Square Enix's anime adaptation of The World Ends with You received its first teaser trailer and a few more details as to what fans of the 2007 Nintendo DS classic can expect from this new project.As … [+2097 chars]

articles.title: Adorama 4th of July Sale: Up to 65% off MacBook Pro/Air, iPad, accessories, more - 9to5Mac
articles.description: The Adorama 4th of July sale is now in full swing. This year’s event features a range of notable discounts including MacBook Pro and MacBook Air configurations, along with a substantial collection of price drops in the smart home and entertainment categories.…
